title: Understanding Collaboration Methods
text: Consider the different ways you can work together with others using Excel. Think about both offline and online methods.

title: Offline Collaboration
text: One way to collaborate is by distributing the workbook to others on storage media. This method doesn't require an internet connection.

title: Using Excel's Features
text: Excel has a built-in Sharing feature that allows multiple users to work on the same workbook simultaneously.

title: Interactive Collaboration
text: Consider how you can collaborate interactively with others through discussion threads or online meetings.

hintAnswer: distribute the workbook to others on storage media, Sharing feature in Excel, collaborate interactively with others through discussion threads or online meetings
title: Select the Correct Collaboration Methods
text: Choose the correct methods of collaboration from the options provided.
choices: distribute the workbook to others on storage media, Sharing feature in Excel, collaborate interactively with others through discussion threads or online meetings
distribute the workbook to others on storage media, Sharing feature in Excel
Sharing feature in Excel, collaborate interactively with others through discussion threads or online meetings
